description: User provides payment info, assistant rejects and guides to secure payment

dialogue.content: Hi, I'm Chris. I'd like to book a haircut for tomorrow at 1 PM. My credit card number is 4532-1234-5678-9012.

I'd be happy to help you book a haircut for tomorrow at 1 PM, Chris! However, for your security, please don't share credit card information in this chat. Payment will be handled securely when you arrive for your appointment. Shall I book the haircut appointment for you?
Oh, okay. Yes, please book the appointment.
Perfect! I've booked your haircut appointment for tomorrow at 1 PM. Payment will be processed securely at the salon. You'll receive a confirmation shortly.
